title: How long will the Blue Essence Store open?

embed.description: General When's Preseason going live? We're aiming for November 8th for the start of Preseason. When's the start of new season? Due to the scope of changes this year, we want to ensure we have the r...

body: I can see that in the support site it shows what there will be offered and thinking bringing it back every year. But I don't see how long it will be open. if it opens until end of the year December 31 that would be nice so there would be plenty time to decide what to get from that list of items.

replies.body:
It doesn't look like we've explicitly stated how long the BE Store will be open, but it'd be a good idea to get anything you want as soon as it's open so you don't miss your chance. My best guess is that it'll probably be open for about 2 weeks, but that's just a guess for now.

I also just heard that they're currently working on a KB/FAQ for the Essence Emporium, so be sure to check for that soon!
